mapper.insert: insert into dht11Data (rasberryPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, sensorTemperature, sensorHumidity, createTime) values (#{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sensorTemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sensorHumidity,jdbcType=REAL}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: update dht11Data set rasberryPiID = #{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sensorID = #{sensorID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=REAL}, collectTime = #{collectTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sensorTemperature = #{sensorTemperature,jdbcType=REAL}, sensorHumidity = #{sensorHumidity,jdbcType=REAL}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, rasberryPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, sensorTemperature, sensorHumidity, createTime from dht11Data where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, rasberryPiID, sensorID, frequency, collectTime, sensorTemperature, sensorHumidity, createTime from dht11Data
